aplus_text: Triphaladi Slimming & Anti Cellulite Potli is a proprietary ayurvedic formulation that contains 12 Ayurvedic Herbs like Amla, Turmeric & Harad etc. These Ayurvedic herbs are believed to generate heat through massage, which helps in the shedding of extra fat in the body. Triphaladi Potli is a customized form of Udwarthanam to deliver the benefits of Ayurvedic weight loss therapy in the comfort of home.It is an excellent collagen booster making skin soft and youthful. It also helps in tightening up the skin pour resulting in clear and healthy skin.Detox is an important part of Weight Loss and Slimming. Turmeric is one of the best Ayurvedic Herbs for Detox and cleansing.It helps in skin tightening and preventing sagging of the skin. They also have fatty acids which keep your skin nourished, hydrated, and moisturized.It helps to reduce body ache due to the Vata Anuloma (Vata balancing) property.Triphaladi Potli is a customized form of Udwarthanam to deliver the benefits of Ayurvedic weight loss therapy in the comfort of home.It is known to exfoliate the skin, reduce fat tissues & make skin radiant & glowing. It contains Udwarthanam which is also very effective in reducing cellulite & fat accumulation. Apart from therapeutic properties Udwarthanam is also helpful to increase skin glow by exfoliating the bodyHow many times can a potli be used again?The Potli can be used as long as it’s consistency persists. When the Potli becomes stiff on touch or when the herbs stop emanating their aroma, the Potli shall be discarded. Depending on individual usage, one can use the Potli up to 15-20 times.In how many days could I expect to see the results?With regular use of 8 weeks approximately you should see visible results. It is always beneficial to have a balanced nutritious diet. Physical activity like running, brisk walking will further help in body toning.Can both Men & Women use this?Yes, absolutely. This is a unisex product. Can be used by both men and women.How to use this for fat loss?After a short massage with luke warm oil, use warm Slimming Potli, with good tolerable hand pressure. Ensure that you do not press too hard. You should experience visible difference with daily use after 6-8 weeks.Is this product safe to use?Yes! Blue Nectar Devtavakadi Potli is made from 100% Ayurvedic natural herbs with no side effects and safe to use.
bullets:
TRADITIONAL AYURVEDIC COMPRESS - For slimming & Cellulite reduction  
, UDWARTHANAM DRY POWDER MASSAGE - Triphaladi Potli has been formulated to delivery benefits of known Udwarthanam Powder massage at home  
, CELLULITE REDUCTION & OBESITY: Contains herbs like Tripahala that are known to break down cellulite & increase burning of accumulated fat.  
, Body exfoliation & Increase skin glow: Upward stroke performed in Potli massage are helpful to soften & exfoliate the skin & remove dead cells from skin, to give a beautiful and lustrous skin  
, FREE FROM CHEMICALS: Potli with Ayurvedic Ingredients. Free from Mineral Oil, Paraben, Sulphate, Preservatives
important_info: Harad, Baheda, Amla, Rasna, Punarnava, Haldi, Saunth, Til Tailam, Sendha Namak, Tea Tree Oil, Alsi Tailam

aplus_text: Balalakshadi Body Oil is a thoughtful potent blend of holistic healing herbs such as Jasmine, Ashwagandha, cold pressed Sesame Oil & Linseed Oil that penetrates into the deeper tissues & provides intense Moisturization and Nourishment to the skin.Jasmine has a stimulating effect on the brain that helps to improve Mood & promotes feeling of Wellbeing & Romantic.Ashwagandha helps to repair Dry & Dull Skin.
